name: Soul Light (Delighton)
description:
You play a divine entity who has been sent by God to purify the planet Pandora of the demons.  The inhabitants got manipulated by the devilish system. Many lost their soul, but not all! Some are still fighting and have a strong belief in God. The time has come to take them back.

Will you beat the demons, or will they get your soul?

Soul Light was developed over 5 months as a solo game project for the 6 Semester. 

Controls:
Movement - W, A, S, D
Roll - STRG
Continue - R
Attack - Left Mouse Button
Interaction - F
